name: The Book in a Bag
description:
The Book in a Bag is a small creative project which shows you how to make your own notebooks. The books are put together using only a pair of scissors and a needle and thread. Simply following the 10 steps on the instruction sheet to form your guidebook ‘How to Make a Book’. Suitable for ages 8 and upwards. A great gift for kids, crafty types and book lovers everywhere! The bag contains:
  • 1 x Instruction sheet - follow the instructions to make your guidebook out of this sheet.
  • 3 x additional sheets - after you've made your guidebook you can use these sheets to make more books or other everyday materials.
The paper bag is screen printed by hand and pages digitally printed onto 100% recycled PEFC certified sugar paper. View more photos and information about this product. We also run workshops using the instruction sheets click here to find out more. © Design& Collaboration Ltd 2011.

name: 'Everyday Objects' Prints and Postcards
description:
Limited edition 'Everyday Objects' is a series of prints sold in pairs which explore the extent to which personal values are attached to trivial everyday objects. The quiddity, or 'whatness' of an object, is made visible by breaking the object down into its component parts, revealing the nature of its physical material. It could be asked, in contrast to this, what is the haecceity or the qualities that make an object particular, irreplaceable, or of great value to someone? The prints are available to buys in pairs as follows:
  • Everyday Objects Postcards set of 4
    £4.75 DC-HQPC
  • Mouse pair medium (29.7 x 42cm)
    £55 unframed DC-HQMP-UF
  • Mouse pair large (51.5 x 71.5cm)
    £150 unframed DC-HQMP-LF
  • Pepperpot pair medium (29.7 x 42cm)
    £55 unframed DC-HQPP-UF
  • Pepperpot pair large (51.5 x 71.5cm)
    £150 unframed DC-HQPP-LU
  • Birds pair large (51.5 x 71.5cm)
    £150 unframed DC-HQBP-UF
Details: The digital prints are in limited editions of 40, on 300gsm Somerset paper. View more images on our facebook page. © Fran Hope 2011.

name: to Istanbul... Silkscreen Printed Textiles
description:
Limited edition The patterns in the ‘Istanbul’ range were designed for a series of artists’ books exploring the emotional effects of migration. Illustrations showed responses from visitors and residents, past and present to the City of Istanbul. Features: Cushion covers are silkscreen printed by hand onto cotton sateen and machine sewn by the artist. Rectangular Cushion Cover
£38.00 inc p&p
  • fits cushion pad 38cm x 25cm (15"x10")
  • limited edition of 4
  • front design red/white, back matching design in black/white
  • detailed with complementing covered buttons
  • designer label is sewn into side seems.
  • product tag listing edition number and initialled by the artist.
  • available in a choice of 2 designs:
    'Istanbul Flower' - DC-ICR-01
    'Istanbul Fish' - DC-ICR-02
Square Cushion Cover
£33.00 inc p&p
  • fits cushion pad 38cm x 38cm (15"x15")
  • limited edition of 4
  • front design red/white or black/white with white backs
  • finished with concealed zip
  • product tag listing edition number and initialled by the artist.
  • product tag gives details about the project
  • available in a choice of 2 designs:
    'Istanbul Flower' (red - DC-ICS-01 black - DC-ICS-02)
    'Istanbul Fish' (red DC-ICS-03 black DC-ICS-04)
Covered Buttons
DC-IB £5.35 inc p&p
  • set of 4 silkscreen printed handcovered buttons
  • buttons to be sewn on, not pinned as badge
  • silkscreen printed
  • various red/white and black/white patterns from the '...to Istanbul' range
  • mounted on display card showing project details
Care: hand wash warm, cool iron, do not tumble dry. View more images on our facebook page. © Samantha Barber 2011.

name: Everyday Objects Spoon Cards
description:
Everyday Objects is a project that explores the extent to which personal values are attached to trivial everyday objects. Details:
  • digitally printed inhouse
  • 100% recycled PEFC certified 230 micron card
  • left blank for your own message
  • delivered cello wrapped with a white envelope
  • 105mm x 148mm (folded size).
Available in two colours:
  • DC-BTC - Black
  • DC-CTC - Multi-coloured.
View more images on our facebook page. © Fran Hope 2011.

name: to Istanbul... Greetings Cards
description:
The patterns in the ‘Istanbul’ range were designed for a series of artists’ books exploring the emotional effects of migration. Illustrations showed responses from visitors and residents, past and present to the City of Istanbul. Details:

  • 100% recycled PEFC certified 230 micron card
  • left blank for your own message
  • delivered cello wrapped with a white envelope

Choose from 10 designs:
